mil6.1.3:0.1_0: The Simile of the Making Hand
mil6.1.3:0.4_0: The allowance for the laypeople who had gone forth from the lay life to homelessness.
mil6.1.3:1.1_0: “When the Buddha spoke like this, he said,
mil6.1.3:1.2_0: ‘Having immersion for laypeople or renunciates, I praise right practice for practicing right practice.’
mil6.1.3:1.3_0: If you live at home with the white-clothed laypeople, using sandalwood imported from Kāsi, wearing garlands, perfumes, and makeup; and accepting gold and money, it’s practicing properly, they succeed in the procedure of the skillful teaching.
mil6.1.3:1.4_0: And where is it possible for a lay follower or a monastic?
mil6.1.3:1.5_0: They have no fruit, and result of self-mortification.
mil6.1.3:1.6_0: The training rule on the sharing out of out the affairs that makes you spinters or filthy? What’s the price for such happiness?”
mil6.1.3:2.2_0: ‘Having immersion for laypeople or renunciates, I praise right practice for practicing right practice.’
mil6.1.3:2.3_0: Such is said, great king, if you were rightly gone forth. Then, great king, I’m practicing right.
mil6.1.3:2.4_0: Because of right practice, both skillful and renunciates succeed in the procedure of the skillful teaching.
mil6.1.3:3.1_0: But, great king, we have gone forth from the lay life to homelessness.
mil6.1.3:3.2_0: The going forth of many things, great king, was unable to double.
mil6.1.3:4.1_0: Take the case of a jewel, earrings, not even the gem to enjoy.
mil6.1.3:4.2_0: In the same way, going forth of the multi-layered soles aren’t able to go forth,
mil6.1.3:5.1_0: Your deeds in the ocean is not able to cure the extent of the ocean.
mil6.1.3:5.2_0: In the same way, going forth of the multi-layered soles aren’t able to go forth,
mil6.1.3:6.1_0: Consider any kind of all life, not long for a long time.
mil6.1.3:6.3_0: A renunciate is content with few wishes, content, secluded, aloof, and energetic. Whatever is defiled, they don’t accumulate to any kind of person at all.
mil6.1.3:6.4_0: He is properly processed, cleared, and knocked,
mil6.1.3:6.5_0: In the same way, a deed that emerges from all those gone forth, but doesn’t quickly make it long.”
mil6.1.3:6.6_0: “It’s good, Sir, that you should repeat what I have said.”
mil6.1.3:7.1_0: The third section consisting of going forth when a layman is finished.
